Mostly based on ÊµÅÊ∞¥Ë¥¶ÔºöÂ¶Ç‰Ωï‰ΩøÁî® annie ÊâπÈáè‰∏ãËΩΩ‰ºòÈÖ∑ VIP ËßÜÈ¢ë
using annie, ffmpeg
Both of them can be installed on macOS via homebrew
brew install annie brew install ffmpeg Get cookies  In console (Dev. Tools): document.cookie Or you can use EditThisCookie to get cookie of a vip account  Get url Copy each episode or follow the guide, grap href using online tools:http://tools.buzzstream.com/link-building-extract-urls
It might be easier for a few episodes to just copy and paste
Download # check info annie -i -f fhd -c qqvip.txt -F s01.csv # download fhd if present annie -f fhd -c qqvip.txt -F s01.csv Extra Most of the time is from connection and the actual download time is quite fast.

Test for emoji support üòÑ üòÑ
Not supported in the title yet so one has to edit the layout on the theme stackoverflow, too much trouble…
Math is still not perfect $$ f(x) = e^x $$
Multiple-line does not render nicely with KaTex now
$$ \begin{align} y &=& 1+1 \\\\\\ &=& 2 \end{align} $$ $$ % This works as expected in KaTeX \begin{aligned} a &= 1 \\ b &= 2 \end{aligned} $$ $$ \begin{align} y &=& 1+1 \\\
&=& 2 \end{align} $$

b &= 2 \end{aligned} $$
